attributes.company specialties: CRM, Customer Relationship Management, Technology, SugarCrm, Sugar, Adobe, Marketing Cloud, Microsoft, Adobe Experience Cloud, And Dynamics 365
attributes.about company: A Néctar Consulting, que integra o grupo Experity, parte da Accenture Interactive, é uma empresa compromissada com a transformação digital.   Focada na implementação e consultoria em projetos desenvolvidos com grandes tecnologias de Customer Experience (CX), como CRM cognitivo e soluções guiadas por inteligência artificial, a Néctar conta com parceiros como Adobe, Microsoft, Pegasystems e SugarCRM.  Fundada por profissionais com mais de 17 anos de experiência no mercado, nascemos com o propósito de ajudar nossos clientes a construir relações ainda mais duradouras e significativas com seus próprios clientes.
attributes.company name: Néctar Consulting parte da Accenture Interactive

attributes.company specialties: Information Technology, Cloud Storage, Telephony Management, Chatbot, Artificial Intelligence, Omnichannel, Online Service, Attendance Platform, And Online Communication
attributes.about company: Fundada em 2003, a FORTICS começou suas operações atuando em projetos para comunicação de dados e segurança da informação. Em 2006 ingressou no segmento de voz com soluções para telefonia IP e em 2017 iniciou a vertical de soluções para computação em nuvem. Portanto, além de conhecer em profundidade métricas, rotinas, procedimentos e tecnologias relacionados à telefonia e ao dia a dia de um callcenter, a FORTICS se destaca em relação aos concorrentes por também oferecer soluções que garantem a confidencialidade de seus dados e otimizam o uso da internet, para que o VoIP, tecnologia usada para transformar sinais de voz em pacotes de dados, traga os melhores resultados a sua empresa.  CAMPINAS - SP Rua Doutor Ricardo Benetton Martins, nº 1000, Ed. 9C SL. 9040 e 9041 CEP 13086-902 Polo II de Alta Tecnologia  ORLANDO - FL - EUA 100 W Lucerne Circle Suite 200 – Orlando – FL 32801

attributes.company specialties: Trusted Digital Security, Information Security, Data Privacy, Web Security, API Security, Endpoint Security, Cyber ​​Defense, Intel Thread, Incident Detection, Incident Response, Security Orchestration, Security Automation, Offensive Security, Cyber ​​Posture, Zero Trust Security, Cyber ​​Resilience, Penetration Testing, Ethical Hacking, Digital Security, Information Security, Cybernetics Safety, Cyber ​​Defense, Offensive Safety, Invasion Test, Cybersecurity, Data Protection, Application Security, LGPD, and Bacen 4.658
attributes.about company: Leadcomm is a unique player in the Brazilian market, operating in the "One Stop Shop" format for Digital Security, offering a complete and leading range of solutions, products, services and highly specialized professionals, helping companies to fulfill the noble mission of digital security to protect against cyber attacks and data leakage, supporting and leveraging business areas for a secure digital transformation.  Leadcomm offers implementation, integration and consulting services that help organizations comply with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD) and Central Bank Resolution 4.658. These solutions encompass the security and privacy of structured and unstructured data, the security of mobile and web applications, the security of APIs, the security of endpoints, the increase in cyber defense capabilities, through intelligence, detection, orchestration and response against cyber attacks, the automation of offensive security processes and cyber security posture and the implementation of a leading Zero Trust Security architecture.  Leadcomm has in its DNA, vision and strategy, the exclusive identification and distribution of innovative solutions that guarantee the satisfaction of its customers with the real increase in the posture and maturity of digital security and balancing investment costs with cyber risks.

attributes.company specialties: It, OpenSource, Developer, Jboss, Enterprisedb, Elastic, Artificial Intelligence, Big Date, Middleware, Nifi, Hadoop, WSO2, and API
attributes.about company: Founded in Brazil, in 1991, Tecnisys has the purpose of adding innovative and appropriate solutions to market needs.  The company develops complete solutions for its customers in IT.  It is a major provider of platform solutions supported by Open Source technology and aligned with government guidelines.  These are the main partners:  - Red Hat; - EnterpriseDB; - SUSE; - Cloudera; -Hortonworks; - IBM; - WSO2; - RStudio.

attributes.company specialties: Revenue Assurance, Business Assurance, Fraud Management, Churn Management, Roaming Management, Credit & Collections, Incentives Management, and Data Retention
attributes.about company: WeDo Technologies, founded in 2001, is now part of the Mobileum group, a leading enterprise software and analytics company in roaming, security, fraud and risk management serving more than 700 telecommunication providers in more than 180 countries.  Mobileum delivers analytics solutions that generate and protect revenue, reduce direct and indirect costs, and accelerate digital transformation for Communication Service Providers (CSP). Mobileum focus on key CSP domains, including roaming and interconnect, counter fraud and security, revenue assurance, data monetization and digital transformation. Mobileum’s success is built upon its unique Active Intelligence platform, which logically combines analytics, engagement, and action technology, with deep network insights and easy CSP system integration to deliver seamless end-to-end solutions. In a recent independent third-party survey of global mobile operators, Mobileum was voted as #1 in Innovation for a group of 183 suppliers.  WeDo Technologies innovative risk management solutions analyze large quantities of data, enabling monitoring and control of enterprise-wide processes to ensure revenue protection and risk mitigation. In addition, its data insights empower business management solutions that accelerate automation and optimization across the digital enterprise and enable efficient business processes such as incentive compensation, collections, and wholesale roaming management  Know more at www.mobileum.com, and follow @Mobileum

attributes.company specialties: Telecommunications, voice, videoconferencing, cloud, contact center, omnichannel, data security, videobanking, pabx, chatbot, integrated communication, integrated technology, innovation, digital service, data management, IoT, artificial intelligence, wlan, lan, and suite LAN network
attributes.about company: A Alctel é um centro de soluções tecnológicas voltadas para negócios. Contamos com um time proativo que busca trazer soluções inovadoras e seguras de forma sustentável para sua empresa.  Fundada em 1996, hoje somos 130 profissionais diretos e 400 indiretos, contamos com a melhor infraestrutura para atender nossos clientes em um mercado cada vez mais exigente.  Nosso propósito é oferecer o que existe de mais moderno em soluções de TIC (Tecnologia da Informação e Comunicação), entender as necessidades dos nossos clientes e assim trazer a melhor solução para o seu negócio.  Possuímos como diferencial o NOC, que presta atendimento 24x07x365 em âmbito nacional.  Nossa missão é entregar com excelência soluções tecnológicas cada vez mais inteligentes.
